name: Link4
description:
This is a simple connect-4 game. The point was to see how far i could get in three hours. The game works, however it lacks a restart button, sound, or any form of win condition. However, if you know how to play, it works well enough- so it's pretty much a virtual version of the real game.

note: I did the art myself, but i am by no means claiming that the idea for the game is mine.
